aston.nabneyit.util

Class Connector

  • java.lang.Object
    • aston.nabneyit.util.Connector
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    IntelligentRouter

    public abstract class Connector
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines the general form of a connector between units in a factory. A Connector has multiple input units and multiple output units, and its job is to route food from input to output following some strategy.

    Strictly speaking, connectors only need to know about the output units, but it is more robust to know about inputs and outputs.

    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Ian T. Nabney

        public abstract void transferProduct(Product p)

        Parameters:
        p - food item to be transferred to one of the output units.
